languages.text: {n}Группа сервиторов неожиданно приходит в движение, и оно пугающе одинаково даже для подобных созданий. Устремив на вас взгляды, они произносят, идеально в унисон:{/n} "Здравствуй. Номос пришли приветствовать твое возвращение".
{n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."
languages.original_text: {n}Группа сервиторов неожиданно приходит в движение, и оно пугающе одинаково даже для подобных созданий. Устремив на вас взгляды, они произносят, идеально в унисон:{/n} "Здравствуй. Номос пришли приветствовать твое возвращение".

traits.locale_text: {n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."
{n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."
{n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."
{n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."
{n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターの集団は突然興奮し出した。その動きは機械にしても恐ろしいくらいに揃っている。彼らはあなたを見つめ、そして完璧な調和で言う。{/n}「こんにちは。ノモスはあなたが戻ってくるのを歓迎するために来ました」
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターの集団は突然興奮し出した。その動きは機械にしても恐ろしいくらいに揃っている。彼らはあなたを見つめ、そして完璧な調和で言う。{/n}「こんにちは。ノモスはあなたが戻ってくるのを歓迎するために来ました」

languages.text: {n}这群机仆突然动了起来，即便对于机器而言，他们的动作也过于整齐划一。所有机仆都在盯着你，不约而同地开了口。{/n}“你好，诺莫斯欢迎你回来。”
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."

traits.locale_text: {n}这群奴工突然动了起来，即便对于机器而言，他们的动作也过于整齐划一。所有奴工都在盯着你，不约而同地开了口。{/n}“你好，诺莫斯欢迎你回来。”

languages.text: {n}Die Gruppe von Servitoren rührt sich plötzlich. Selbst für Automaten sind ihre Bewegungen beängstigend synchron. Sie starren dich an und sagen in perfektem Einklang:{/n} "Hallo. Nomos sind gekommen, um Euch wieder zu begrüßen."
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gruppe von Servitoren rührt sich plötzlich. Selbst für Automaten sind ihre Bewegungen beängstigend synchron. Sie starren dich an und sagen in perfektem Einklang:{/n} "Hallo. Nomos sind gekommen, um Euch wieder zu begrüßen."

languages.text: {n}Le groupe de servitors se met soudain à bouger simultanément. Même s'il s'agit d'automates, il est étrange de les voir effectuer des mouvements parfaitement identiques. Ils vous regardent fixement avant de lâcher à l'unisson :{/n} « Bonjour. Nous sommes venus vous saluer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le groupe de servitors se met soudain à bouger simultanément. Même s'il s'agit d'automates, il est étrange de les voir effectuer des mouvements parfaitement identiques. Ils vous regardent fixement avant de lâcher à l'unisson :{/n} « Bonjour. Nous sommes venus vous saluer. »

languages.text: {n}El grupo de servidores se agita de repente; aun tratándose de autómatas, sus movimientos son escalofriantemente idénticos. Todos te observan con atención y hablan en perfecto unísono.{/n} «Hola. Nomos hemos venido para darle la bienvenida».
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."

traits.locale_text: {n}El grupo de servidores se agita de repente; aun tratándose de autómatas, sus movimientos son escalofriantemente idénticos. Todos te observan con atención y hablan en perfecto unísono.{/n} «Hola. Nomos hemos venido para darle la bienvenida».

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör grubu aniden hareketleniyor. Hareketleri otomatonlar için bile o kadar özdeş ki insanın gözünü korkutuyor. Gözlerini sana dikerek kusursuz bir ahenkle konuşuyorlar.{/n} "Merhaba. Nomos sizi karşılamaya geldi."
languages.original_text: {n}The group of servitors suddenly stirs, their movements frighteningly identical even for automatons. They stare at you and say in perfect unison,{/n} "Hello. Nomos have come to welcome you back."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetör grubu aniden hareketleniyor. Hareketleri otomatonlar için bile o kadar özdeş ki insanın gözünü korkutuyor. Gözlerini sana dikerek kusursuz bir ahenkle konuşuyorlar:{/n} "Merhaba. Nomos sizi karşılamaya geldi."
